Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or operations. Considering its value and the effort put into its creation, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7500. I trust this price reflects both the quality of the product and the opportunity to bring value to your life or business. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
